Text: I also forgot the very first step, unzip the zips :)
just a side note for next time, insted of using zip just make the torrent with the .avi files. That way we can just direct the torrent file to our cache and just download those sheeps we dont have...

I tried that, but the .torrent file was too large as it has to store a hash for every single file. And I used zip archives since not everyone uses rar.

When I tried to upload the torrent file there was just a white screen, it's some error on tpb with large .torrent files.
